mapper.update: update db_postmessage set TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FROMOPER = #{fromoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOOPER = #{tooper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCR = #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, TITLE, FROMOPER, TOOPER, OPERTIME, FLAG, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, DESCR, RESERVE1, RESERVE2 from db_postmessage where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SEQUENCEID, TITLE, FROMOPER, TOOPER, OPERTIME, FLAG, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, DESCR, RESERVE1, RESERVE2 from db_postmessage
